name: Instant Pot Tuscan Chicken
instructions: Once hot, add chicken thigh to inner pot to brown on all sides, ~4 minutes
Transfer browned meat to plate and cover loosely with foil
Add chicken broth to de-glaze with a wooden spoon scraping the brown bits from the bottom of the pot
Add rice then add chicken back in one even layer
layer with artichoke hears, sun dried tomatoes, and herbs
Pressure cook on high for 10 minutes
When time is up, allow for 5 minutes natural release, then quick release the rest of the pressure
Garnish with fresh basil and serve

additional_context.story: Tori's Parents love this recipe! It's a great way to make a delicious meal in under an hour with minimal effort.
additional_context.tips: Draining some of the oil from the pesto helps reduce excess oiliness in the final dish.
